page.title: 17A day in an 8yr. olds life.
page.content: On school days I get up at about 7am. I go downstairs and have cornflakes or Weetabix,toast with jam and a drink of orange juice.After breakfast I get washed and dressed.On school days I wear my school uniform;grey trousers and shirt,striped tie and a royal blue jesey.When I get to school I hang up my bag and go out to play with my friends.At 9am. the bell goes and we all go in.After register and assembly we go back into class and do maths, writing and reading.Sometimes we do painting,modelling,singing,drama, science experiments and other inter- esting things.When I get home at about 3.15 I play snooker.Then I have my dinner and a bath.I put my pyjamas on and watch television and go to bed at 9pm.
